name: FPS Prototype
description:
What is this?

Pre-alpha prototype for an upcoming FPS game.

The intent of this prototype was to create and refine the movement and shooting mechanics - the bread and butter of FPS gamefeel.

Default Controls:

Movement: WASD

Sprint: Left Shift

Crouch: Left Control

Jump: Space

Shoot: Left Mouse

Aim Down Sights: Right Mouse

Switch Weapons: Q

While sprinting, you may slide by pressing crouch.

Holding jump allows mounting up ledges.
